layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x110
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x110
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x86
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 257x18
          text run at (0,0) width 257: "There should be two lines of text below."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,34) size 784x18 [color=#FF0000]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 226x18
          text run at (0,0) width 226: "This line should be white on green."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,68) size 784x18 [color=#FF0000]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 226x18
          text run at (0,0) width 226: "This line should be white on green."
